CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Apttus_CMConfig__LineType__c,"Option"), IF(CONTAINS($Setup.APT_R2T_System_Properties__c.Product_Name__c ,Apttus_CMConfig__OptionId__r.Name), Apttus_CMConfig__OptionId__r.Name + ' (per article)',IF(Apttus_CMConfig__OptionId__r.Name ='Manual Handling Surcharge', Apttus_CMConfig__OptionId__r.Name + ' (per eligible article)', Apttus_CMConfig__OptionId__r.Name)),null)
CustomField.label: Option Product Name
